about: In Volume 1, we have honor to publish first scientific publications of $mika$ on data-collection of cat vocalizations §mika§; of $lilli$ on learning system for Sorbian language §lilli§; of $franz$ on optimization of an own Large Language Model (LLM) for simplified German §franz§; of $celefinn$ on design of a modular puzzle and feeder for crows §celefinn§; of $max$ on multiplayer free association game §max§; of $pierre$ on optimization of own finances by means of LLM-driven data aggregation §pierre§; of $manuelsena$ on unf*cking the Berlin market with flats and realities §manuelsena§ and of $alessandro$ on development of reinforcement algorithms which will gradually turn Berlin Open Lab’s robotic arm into a Picasso-like painter §alessandro§.
